name: Car Escape Maze Mystery 2
description:
Car Escape Maze Mystery 2 is the most addictive car race game ever! The goal of this racer game is to drive your car within in a 3D realistic environment that you will love.you will have to drive your car very carefully without hitting any vehicle or you will loose. Sounds easy? But, would you be able to truly drive your car, complete the challenges and avoid hitting the cars within the given time.
Features:
-Breathtaking visuals and amazing cars
-More coins to unlock and upgrade
-Customize your cars
-More racing scence to choose
-HD graphics
-Realistic car racing feeling
-Super fast speed
